languages.text: Переоснащенная горнодобывающая техника может заинтересовать пиратов Простора — промышленный лазер легко превратить в оружие.
Retrofitted mining equipment may be of interest to the pirates of the Expanse — it does not take a brilliant mind to turn a mining laser into a weapon.
languages.original_text: Переоснащенная горнодобывающая техника может заинтересовать пиратов Простора — промышленный лазер легко превратить в оружие.

traits.locale_text: Retrofitted mining equipment may be of interest to the pirates of the Expanse — it does not take a brilliant mind to turn an industrial laser into a weapon.
Retrofitted mining equipment may be of interest to the pirates of the Expanse — enough to make a deal with them.
Retrofitted mining equipment may be of interest to the pirates of the Expanse — it does not take a brilliant mind to turn a mining laser into a weapon.
Retrofitted mining equipment may be of interest to the pirates of the Expanse — enough to make a deal with them.
Retrofitted mining equipment may be of interest to the pirates of the Expanse — it does not take a brilliant mind to turn an industrial laser into a weapon.
Retrofitted mining equipment may be of interest to the pirates of the Expanse — it does not take a brilliant mind to turn a mining laser into a weapon.
Retrofitted mining equipment may be of interest to the pirates of the Expanse — it does not take a brilliant mind to turn a mining laser into a weapon.

languages.text: Du matériel d'extraction minière modernisé pourrait intéresser les pirates des Étendues. Après tout, il n'est pas nécessaire d'être un génie pour transformer un laser minier en arme.
languages.original_text: Retrofitted mining equipment may be of interest to the pirates of the Expanse — it does not take a brilliant mind to turn a mining laser into a weapon.

traits.locale_text: Du matériel d'extraction minière modernisé pourrait intéresser les pirates des Étendues. Après tout, il n'est pas nécessaire d'être un génie pour transformer un laser minier en arme.

languages.text: 改造された採掘設備は、エクスパンスの海賊にとって興味深いかもしれない。マイニングレーザーを武器として使うというのは、誰にでも思いつく事だ。
languages.original_text: Retrofitted mining equipment may be of interest to the pirates of the Expanse — it does not take a brilliant mind to turn a mining laser into a weapon.

traits.locale_text: 改造された採掘設備は、エクスパンスの海賊にとって興味深いかもしれない。マイニングレーザーを武器として使うというのは、誰にでも思いつく事だ。

languages.text: 科罗努斯扩区的海盗或许会对改造后的采矿装置感兴趣。毕竟，把采矿用的激光发射器改造成武器是件轻而易举的事情。
languages.original_text: Retrofitted mining equipment may be of interest to the pirates of the Expanse — it does not take a brilliant mind to turn a mining laser into a weapon.

traits.locale_text: 科罗努斯扩区的海盗或许会对改造后的采矿装置感兴趣。毕竟，把采矿用的激光发射器改造成武器是件轻而易举的事情。

languages.text: El equipo minero modificado podría interesar a los piratas de la Extensión. No hace falta ser un genio para convertir un láser de minería en arma.
languages.original_text: Retrofitted mining equipment may be of interest to the pirates of the Expanse — it does not take a brilliant mind to turn a mining laser into a weapon.

traits.locale_text: El equipo minero modificado podría interesar a los piratas de la Extensión. No hace falta ser un genio para convertir un láser de minería en arma.

languages.text: Nachträglich angebrachte Bergbauausrüstung kann für die Piraten der Ausdehnung von Interesse sein — man muss kein Genie sein, um aus einem Bergbaulaser eine Waffe zu machen.
languages.original_text: Retrofitted mining equipment may be of interest to the pirates of the Expanse — it does not take a brilliant mind to turn a mining laser into a weapon.

traits.locale_text: Nachträglich angebrachte Bergbauausrüstung kann für die Piraten der Ausdehnung von Interesse sein — man muss kein Genie sein, um aus einem Bergbaulaser eine Waffe zu machen.

languages.text: Parçaları değiştirilen maden ekipmanları, Enginlik korsanlarının ilgisini çekebilir. Neticede bir maden lazerini silaha dönüştürmek için dâhi olmaya lüzum yok.
languages.original_text: Retrofitted mining equipment may be of interest to the pirates of the Expanse — it does not take a brilliant mind to turn a mining laser into a weapon.
